title: Sampling Distribution of Sample Prop: Get Off Social Media, Mom!
question_text: A recent survey  in the town of Pleasantville found that $55\%$ of the adults had a social media account. The true percentage of adults that have a social media account in Pleasantville is $58\%$ . Using simple random samples of size $100$ , what are the mean and standard deviation respectively,  for the sampling distribution of the sample proportions of adults who own a social media account in Pleasantville?
